body:
**Is this a BUG REPORT or FEATURE REQUEST?**:

/kind bug

**What happened**:

PV Protection e2e test "Verify "immediate" deletion of a PV that is not bound to a PVC" failed like
```
[sig-storage] PV Protection
/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/test/e2e/storage/utils/framework.go:22
  Verify "immediate" deletion of a PV that is not bound to a PVC [BeforeEach]
  /go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/test/e2e/storage/pv_protection.go:93

  Expected
      <bool>: false
  to be true

  /go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/test/e2e/storage/pv_protection.go:83
------------------------------
 16 17:52:48.408: INFO: Running AfterSuite actions on all node
Aug 16 17:52:48.408: INFO: Running AfterSuite actions on node 1
```

**What you expected to happen**:

The test can pass.

**How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible)**:

I am just kicking the test with

```
$ go run hack/e2e.go -- --provider=skeleton --test --test_args="--ginkgo.focus=deletion\sof\sa\sPV\sthat\sis\snot\sbound\sto\sa\sPVC"
```

**Environment**:
- Kubernetes version (use `kubectl version`): v1.11.1
- Cloud provider or hardware configuration: OpenStack
- OS (e.g. from /etc/os-release): Ubuntu 16.04.4 LTS
- Kernel (e.g. `uname -a`): 4.4.0-130-generic
- Install tools: kubeadm
- Others:

labels.description: Categorizes issue or PR as related to a bug.
labels.name: kind/bug

labels.description: Categorizes an issue or PR as relevant to SIG Storage.
labels.name: sig/storage

title: PV Protection e2e test fails in BeforeEach stage
